author: twomin
title: 2Min Review by Vietnamese Voices
description: Voters and stakeholders in non-English communities, such as Vietnam, find it hard to understand Catalyst proposals written in English
solution: Producing short Vietnamese videos & podcasts lasting 2 minutes containing analyzed information for 25% of the proposals in Fund 8 and Fund 9
experience: The 2Min Review team consists of CA, vCA, community builders, researchers, and video producers.
